title: SADDLES; STIRRUPS
definition_statement: This place covers: Saddling equipment for riding- or pack-animals; stirrups; covers for riding or pack animals when working.

title: Saddling equipment for riding- or pack-animals
definition_statement: This place covers: Saddle-racks for supporting or cleaning purposes; devices for positioning the saddle more to the rear; saddles, bottom pads for saddles; saddle cloths; saddle covers or similar; belts or straps for saddles and tighteners therefor; devices for fastening stirrups to saddles; stirrup leathers; pockets, receptacles, or other supporting devices attached or attachable to saddles (e.g. for the insertion of arms); safety release mechanisms (e.g. for rodeo); saddle horns.

title: Covers for animals when working, e.g. for protecting
